sentence.Network_en: Some people may be tempted to give untruthful answers.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些人也许会不由得想要作出不实回答。

sentence.Network_en: He must not be untruthful, or a coward.
sentence.Network_cn: 他绝不能是虚伪或胆怯之徒。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 非字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 相当于“不”、“不是”〖 no;not〗 不真实〖 untruthful〗 同本义〖 violate;runcounterto;notconformto〗.
社会工作专业英语词汇(U) ... untrustworthy 不可靠的 untruthful 不诚实的 unversed 无知的.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译(U2) ... untruth 不真实 untruthful 不真实的 unture 不正确的.

list.abs: This painting gave people an untruth impression ., 这幅画给人不真实的印象.
That ' s an untruthful description ., 那是一个不真实的记述.
It is a untruth to say that happy is the nation that has no history ., 说没有历史的民族是幸福的民族 , 这是卑劣的谎言.
He never told an untruth in his life ., 他有生以来从来没有说过一句假话.

entry.tran: 不真实的；虚伪的；虚假的
entry.def: If someone is untruthful or if they say untruthful things, they are dishonest and say things that they know are not true.

example.ex: He must not be untruthful, or a coward...
example.tran: 他绝不能是虚伪或胆怯之徒。

example.ex: Some people may be tempted to give untruthful answers.
example.tran: 有些人也许会不由得想要作出不实回答。

means.word_mean: 1. not expressing or given to expressing the truth;

sentences.sentence: "the statement given under oath was untruthful"
